global_settings.negative_prompt: blurry, distortion, low quality, bad anatomy, text, watermark, cartoon, unrealistic, deformed limbs

segments.prompt: Cinematic wide shot. An empty cricket stadium with dramatic mood lighting. A fast bowler running in slow motion towards the pitch, highly focused. Sudden freeze frame effect at the moment of delivery.
3D medical animation. Extreme close-up of muscle fibers glowing orange and red as they heat up. Visualizing increased blood flow through veins. Scientific and clean aesthetic.

Cinematic slow motion. Close-up of a cricket fast bowler's front foot landing hard on the pitch. A subtle digital shockwave ripple effect extending up the leg to the lower back to visualize heavy impact force.
High speed action shot. A cricket batsman swinging the bat with immense power. X-ray overlay style showing the rotation of the torso and tension in the oblique and shoulder muscles.
Action shot. A cricket fielder exploding from a standstill into a full sprint, then diving. Grass and dust flying. Focus on the sudden acceleration and muscle engagement.

Motion graphics overlay. A futuristic medical data graph floating in the air over a blurred cricket training ground background. A line graph trending downward showing injury risk reduction. High tech sports science look.
Montage style. A professional cricketer performing dynamic warm-up drills: high knees, hip rotations, and lunges on a sunny practice field. Fluid and controlled movement.
Cinematic close-up. A cricket team standing in a huddle, arms around each other. Camera pans across their intense, determined, and sweating faces. Golden hour lighting.
